metadata.title: CVE-2021-41819 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
CGI::Cookie.parse in Ruby through 2.6.8 mishandles security prefixes incookie names. This also affects the CGI gem through 0.3.0 for Ruby.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-41819` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.5 - 2.5.1-1ubuntu1.11
ruby2.5 - 2.5.1-1ubuntu1.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby2.5 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1ubuntu1.11').
